title: 谁给下重铸宝可梦的神兽刷新指令
author: 科学坑

replies.author: 曲骑、炮灰
replies.txt_content: 应该差不多了吧（来源：百度）梦幻：/pokespawn mew超梦：/pokespawn mewtow固拉多：/pokespawn Groudon裂空座：/pokespawn Rayquaza盖欧卡：/pokespawn Kyogre雷公：/pokespawn Raikou炎帝：/pokespawn Entei水君：/pokespawn Suicune雪拉比：/pokespawn celebi洛基亚：/pokespawn lugia急冻鸟：/pokespawn Articuno火焰鸟：/pokespawn Moltres闪电鸟：/pokespawnZapdos

replies.author: 科学坑
replies.txt_content:

应该差不多了吧（来源：百度）
不是这个啊，是查询神兽刷新几率的那个指令

replies.txt_content:
